name: Double Digit
tagline: Digital Agency in San Jose, Costa Rica
description: Based in San Jose, Costa Rica and with offices in New York and Dallas, we're a technology-based company that helps clients transform and benefit from the inherent value of knowledge and information. Our project and team-based services include creative and development of digital technologies, social media monitoring, campaign support, content creation and management, media planning, buying, innovation R&D, testing and deployment.
